message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Can you meet me at $90?
I'm willing to compromise, Bob! I can offer it to you for $105.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to get as close to the lowest price as possible. Can you meet me at $85?
I'm not willing to go as low as $85, Bob. But I can offer it to you for $95.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'd love to get the product at this price. Can you meet me at $80?
